mean_en: not perfect; not working or made correctly; (of a way of thinking) wrong or containing mistakes, often resulting in bad decisions
sentence: Run! This toaster is faulty and might kill your toast at any time!
sentence_trans: 快跑！这个烤面包机出故障了，它随时都可能毁了你的面包！
word_etyma: fault犯错误 + y……的 → faulty有错误的，有缺点的
